<h3 id="X12572">X(12572)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd EXTOUCH TO 5th CONWAY</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^4+(b+c)*a^3-(b+c)^2*a^2-(b+c)^3*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<br>
<b>X(12572) = X(72)+3*X(11113) = 3*X(442)-X(10123) = 3*X(553)-5*X(5439) = X(950)-3*X(11113) = 5*X(1698)-X(1770) = 5*X(3876)+3*X(11114)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(1).</p>
<p>X(12572) lies on these lines: {1,329}, {2,4292}, {3,3452}, {4,9}, {5,5745}, {7,5129}, {8,3586}, {12,3683}, {20,936}, {21,908}, {30,5044}, {35,1005}, {37,5717}, {44,1834}, {46,8582}, {56,226}, {57,5084}, {63,1210}, {72,519}, {78,4304}, {84,6865}, {142,11108}, {144,938}, {191,1737}, {200,4294}, {201,1877}, {204,7952}, {210,6284}, {355,5837}, {376,5438}, {377,3305}, {381,5325}, {387,1743}, {390,5815}, {392,10106}, {440,3454}, {442,1155}, {443,7308}, {474,5316}, {515,960}, {517,5795}, {522,11247}, {527,942}, {528,4662}, {551,3487}, {553,5439}, {758,6738}, {846,5530}, {946,958}, {956,12053}, {962,9623}, {997,1490}, {1006,5267}, {1058,6762}, {1104,4415}, {1167,1785}, {1260,8715}, {1329,4640}, {1330,3912}, {1479,4847}, {1697,3421}, {1698,1770}, {1699,5234}, {1901,4205}, {2049,5257}, {2321,5814}, {2325,3695}, {2816,3042}, {2886,5302}, {3085,4512}, {3091,5273}, {3219,5046}, {3244,3488}, {3419,3626}, {3436,5250}, {3523,5328}, {3579,3820}, {3601,11111}, {3678,6743}, {3679,5175}, {3686,5295}, {3687,7283}, {3710,5016}, {3717,5015}, {3811,4314}, {3817,5715}, {3868,10399}, {3874,5728}, {3876,11114}, {3883,4385}, {3911,3916}, {3927,5722}, {3929,9581}, {3940,12437}, {3947,10198}, {4186,7085}, {4199,6685}, {4222,5285}, {4293,8583}, {4301,5758}, {4357,4911}, {4387,10371}, {4416,10449}, {4703,5928}, {4863,9670}, {4999,5087}, {5047,5249}, {5051,5294}, {5057,5260}, {5082,9580}, {5119,6736}, {5219,6857}, {5223,5809}, {5231,10591}, {5251,12047}, {5289,5882}, {5290,8232}, {5692,6737}, {5703,11106}, {5709,6893}, {5720,6868}, {5744,6919}, {5762,5806}, {5779,5787}, {5927,10176}, {6245,6827}, {6666,8728}, {6705,6922}, {6832,10171}, {6908,10164}, {6920,11813}, {6992,10884}, {7007,8806}, {7082,10953}, {7580,12512}, {8226,12571}, {8983,9678}, {9841,12246}, {10888,12545}</p>
<p>
X(12572) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1,12527}, {8,10624}, {72,950}, {6737,10572}<br>
X(12572) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3874,6744), (4292,12436), (4298,1125), (6743,3678)<br>
X(12572) = anticomplement of X(12436)<br>
X(12572) = complement of X(4292)<br>
X(12572) = X(389)-of-2nd-extouch-triangle<br>
X(12572) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2,4292,12436), (3,3452,6700), (4,9,10), (40,2551,10), (57,5084,9843), (63,2478,1210), (72,11113,950), (78,6872,4304), (226,405,1125), (329,452,1), (390,5815,6765), (1329,4640,6684), (1490,6987,4297), (2551,5698,40), (3091,5273,5705), (3219,5046,6734), (3487,5436,551), (3488,11523,3244), (5812,6913,946), (7308,9579,443)<br>
</p>
